The global number of confirmed coronavirus cases has topped 78 million, and a new, more infectious variant of the deadly virus is now threatening the world.
Just as vaccines were expected to become … [+6601 chars]

articles.author: Tina Bellon, Melissa Fares
articles.title: Explainer-U.S. vaccine rollout's next challenge: Verifying who is 'essential' - Reuters
articles.description: As U.S. industries push for their workers to receive early access to COVID-19 vaccines, local health departments and pharmacies face the challenge of verifying the identity of essential workers to ensure no one cuts the line.
articles.content: (Reuters) -As U.S. industries push for their workers to receive early access to COVID-19 vaccines, local health departments and pharmacies face the challenge of verifying the identity of essential wo… [+4708 chars]
